name: ToseePlus
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With the Tosee Plus Skill and Alexa, you can now access your devices using Alexa with your Echo Show, Echo Spot, Fire TV, Second Generations of The Fire TV Stick, Fire TV Edition smart TVs or Fire Tablets(Gen7 and above).

To get started, please follow the steps below:
1. Connect your device to the App that manufacturer provided
2. Make sure that your device is online and works properly
3. Search for Tosee Plus Skill in your Alexa App
4. Click the "Enable Skill" button to link your device's account with Alexa account and discover your device


Now enjoy and play your device with voice control, like:
- "Alexa, show the doorbell"

Compatible Amazon Alexa Device:
* Echo Show
* Echo Spot
* Fire Tablets Generation 7th and above
* All generations of Fire TV
* Second generations of Fire TV stick
* Fire TV Edition smart TVs

If you have any questions, please contact us at support@tocoding.com
